articles.title: Gavin Newsom Slams ‘Pathetic’ Shutdown Deal as ‘Surrender’ - The Daily Beast
articles.description: “America deserves better,” Newsom raged after the vote.
articles.content:
California Gov. Gavin Newsom came out swinging against a Senate deal to end the government shutdown, deeming it a Democratic surrender.

articles.author: Peter Gelling
articles.title: Trump floats using tariff revenue to send $2,000 checks to Americans. Here's how that could hurt people in the long run. - Business Insider
articles.description: Trump says he will use tariff revenue to send $2,000 checks to Americans. While most would welcome the infusion, it could cost them in the long run.
articles.content:
Most Americans would probably welcome an unexpected $2,000 infusion to their bank accounts, courtesy of their federal government.
It might, however, be too good to be true.
